skills.name: Felling Order
skills.desc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target, with a chance to Bleed the hit target. If the hit target is not Shielded, then a random ally of theirs suffers "Dismantle" for 1 time.

skills.name: Lock On Target
skills.desc: Locks Onto a single target. The next action on the target will cast "Felling Order."

skills.name: Disintegration Order
skills.desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

skills.name: Dismantle
skills.desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.
